ipydb: Work with databases in IPython
=====================================

ipydb is an `IPython <http://ipython.org>`_ plugin for running SQL queries and viewing their results


Here's some asciicasts showing off some of ipydb's features.

1) Running queries, tab-completion and tab-expansions with the ``%sql`` command.

.. raw:: html

    <script type="text/javascript" src="https://asciinema.org/a/12329.js" id="asciicast-12329" async data-speed="2"></script>

2) Schema browsing with ``tables``, ``fields``, ``fks``, ``relationhips`` and
``describe``
